Description:
who you areYou must be a qualified and experienced clinical psychologists and counseling psychologists with experience in working with people with eating disorders to join its growing team in Dubai. You must have an exciting far-reaching vision for transforming mental health in the region and beyond, anchored in exemplary client service, unmatched professional development and deep community involvement.Skills & Competencies:Specific expertise in one or more of the following areas a plus:
Working with children and young people with eating disorders
Working with adults with eating disorders
Ability to provide client service in Arabic is a plus (but not required)
Experience working with culturally and linguistically diverse populations
Experience with clinical supervisionEducation & Qualifications:Master’s or Doctorate level qualification in Clinical or Counselling Psychology
Specialized training and minimum of 3 years of work experience for Doctorate and 5 years for Master’s level, including at least 1 year of experience in working with people with eating disorders
Dubai Health Authority (DHA) or Community Development Authority (CDA) licensableJob Details
